thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Swamped by Growth, Silicon Valley Weighs Taxing Big Employers

author: Nour Malas
title: Swamped by Growth, Silicon Valley Weighs Taxing Big Employers
text:
The Silicon Valley cities that are home to Google and Apple Inc. are considering the kind of per-employee tax that Seattle recently drew criticism for imposing.
Mountain View, Calif., and nearby Cupertino are both weighing possible ballot measures this fall. Officials said the taxes could raise money to help manage local problems tied to rapid growth, including traffic and a need for affordable housing.
